title: CyclingTips Podcast: Ciccone is in uncharted waters – Giro d’Italia stage 6
content:
Stage 6 of the Giro d’Italia saw some significant movement in the general classification, redemption for Bahrain-Victorious, and a very bazaar situation with the Team BikeExchange car and Pieter Serry. 

The post CyclingTips Podcast: Ciccone is in uncharted waters – Giro d’Italia stage 6 appeared first on CyclingTips.
author: Abby Mickey
